name: Step N Pace Shoes
desc: Lightweight running shoes with Cloudfoam midsole for all-day comfort. Breathable mesh upper keeps your feet cool during workouts. Perfect for jogging and gym sessions.

name: Ultraboost 22
desc: Premium running shoes with responsive Boost technology. Features a Primeknit+ adaptive fit upper and Continental rubber outsole for superior traction. Marathon-ready comfort.

name: NMD_R1
desc: Iconic streetwear sneakers with EVA plugs for striking style. Boost midsole delivers energy return with every step. Fashion-forward design meets urban comfort.

name: Superstar
desc: The classic shell-toe design that started a revolution. Leather upper with rubber shell toe for durability. Timeless sneaker that works with any casual outfit.

name: 4DFWD 2
desc: Cutting-edge running shoes with 3D-printed midsole. Designed to propel you forward with each stride. Combines data-driven design with premium materials for elite performance.

name: Ozweego
desc: 90s-inspired chunky sneakers with modern comfort. Features adiprene cushioning for shock absorption. Retro-futuristic design with mesh and synthetic leather upper.
